name: Amon Warmann
review: So, Spiderman-No Way Home is flat out AMAZING. In fact, it's SPECTACULAR. I might even go as far as to say it's the ULTIMATE Spiderman Movie. They absolutely nailed it. Wow.

name: Isiah
review: I went to watch Spiderman-No Way Home twice in a day. That says a lot about how good the movie is!

name: Lewis Cooper
review: Spiderman-No Way Home was simply incredible. Top-tier MCU.

name: Ali Plumb
review: You all should watch Spiderman-No Way Home because there were tears of joy and just flat-out tears in the cinema.

name: Faima Baker
review: Spiderman-No Way Home was so amazing. I feel like a changed person.

name: Damien
review: Spiderman-No Way Home was phenomenal!! I need to see it again.
